data.eml:eml: A new species of the genus Megophrys (Anura: Megophryidae) from Yunnan Province, China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yang, Jian-Huan, Wang, Jian, Wang, Ying-Yong (2018): A new species of the genus Megophrys (Anura: Megophryidae) from Yunnan Province, China. Zootaxa 4413 (2): 325-338, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4413.2.5
